breakfast.name: Avocado Toast with Egg
breakfast.instructions: Toast bread. Smash avocado and top with a fried egg.

lunch.name: Chicken Grain Bowl
lunch.instructions: Cook rice. Sear chicken. Assemble with spinach and drizzle olive oil.

dinner.name: Garlic Salmon & Broccoli
dinner.instructions: Roast salmon and broccoli with garlic until tender.

lunch.name: Caprese Salad
lunch.instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. Layer with basil.

lunch.name: Veggie Stir-fry
lunch.instructions: Stir-fry veggies. Finish with soy sauce.

dinner.name: Lemon Herb Pasta
dinner.instructions: Cook pasta. Toss with lemon zest and parmesan.

lunch.name: Turkey Wrap
lunch.instructions: Wrap turkey and lettuce in tortilla.

dinner.name: Miso Glazed Cod
dinner.instructions: Glaze cod with miso and bake until flaky.

dinner.name: Homemade Veggie Pizza
dinner.instructions: Assemble pizza and bake until golden.

breakfast.name: Banana Oatmeal
breakfast.instructions: Cook oats and top with banana.

lunch.name: Chicken & Quinoa Power Bowl
lunch.instructions: Combine shredded chicken, spinach, grated carrots, and cooked quinoa. Drizzle with lemon-olive oil dressing.

dinner.name: One-Pan Turkey & Veggie Skillet
dinner.instructions: Sauté ground turkey with diced peppers, onions, and spinach in a skillet. Serve over remaining cooked quinoa.

breakfast.name: Savory Oatmeal
breakfast.instructions: Cook oats in water/broth. Top with a fried egg, sautéed spinach, and a dash of soy sauce.

lunch.name: Turkey Leftover Wrap
lunch.instructions: Wrap leftover turkey skillet mixture inside charred tortillas or lettuce leaves with sliced carrots.

dinner.name: Sheet Pan Lemon-Garlic Shrimp
dinner.instructions: Toss shrimp, broccoli, and cubed sweet potatoes with oil and garlic. Roast on a sheet pan until tender.

breakfast.name: Sweet Potato Breakfast Hash
breakfast.instructions: Sauté diced sweet potatoes, onions, and peppers until crisp. Top with poached eggs.

lunch.name: Shrimp & Veggie Salad
lunch.instructions: Serve cold shrimp over spinach, peppers, and carrots. Dress with lemon vinaigrette.

dinner.name: Crispy Tofu Stir-Fry
dinner.instructions: Sear cubed tofu with vegetables. Add soy sauce, ginger, and garlic. Serve over rice.

breakfast.name: Veggie Scramble
breakfast.instructions: Scramble eggs with remaining peppers, onions, and spinach. Side of toasted oats or sweet potato.

lunch.name: Tofu Quinoa Salad
lunch.instructions: Mix leftover tofu with quinoa, chopped parsley, and shredded carrots.

dinner.name: Kitchen Sink Roasted Soup
dinner.instructions: Roast remaining veggies and blend with broth, or simmer in a pot with black beans as a stew.

lunch.name: Classic Char Siu Rice
lunch.instructions: 1. Roast honey-glazed pork. 2. Steam rice. 3. Blanch bok choy. 4. Slice pork and serve over rice.

dinner.name: Wonton & Shrimp Noodle Soup
dinner.instructions: 1. Boil broth. 2. Cook noodles, wontons, and greens. 3. Serve hot in soup.
dinner.notes: Replaced Char Siu with Wontons to meet the request of only one Char Siu dish.

lunch.name: Ginger-Soy Steamed Fish
lunch.instructions: 1. Place fish on plate with ginger. 2. Steam for 8-10 mins. 3. Add soy sauce and scallions. 4. Serve with rice.

dinner.name: Tomato & Egg Drop Soup
dinner.instructions: 1. Sauté tomatoes. 2. Add water and tofu; simmer. 3. Swirl in beaten eggs. 4. Serve with rice.

lunch.name: Stir-fry Shredded Pork & Vegetables
lunch.instructions: 1. Slice vegetables and pork into strips. 2. Stir-fry with minimal oil. 3. Serve with steamed rice.
lunch.notes: Replaced Char Siu with fresh pork loin strips.

dinner.name: Daikon & Pork Rib Soup
dinner.instructions: 1. Blanch ribs. 2. Simmer ribs and daikon with ginger for 1 hour. 3. Season and serve with rice.

lunch.name: Oyster Sauce Tofu & Broccoli
lunch.instructions: 1. Blanch broccoli. 2. Braise tofu lightly in oyster sauce and aromatics. 3. Serve with rice.

dinner.name: Napa Cabbage & Meatball Soup
dinner.instructions: 1. Form pork meatballs. 2. Poach in ginger broth. 3. Add cabbage until tender. 4. Serve in large bowls.

breakfast.name: Congee with Salted Egg
breakfast.instructions: 1. Boil rice in excess water until broken down. 2. Top with chopped salted egg and scallions.

lunch.name: Shrimp Fried Rice
lunch.instructions: 1. Scramble egg. 2. Sauté shrimp. 3. Toss with rice and peas. 4. Use low oil and high heat.

dinner.name: Poached Chicken in Turmeric Broth
dinner.instructions: 1. Simmer chicken in turmeric-infused broth. 2. Serve chicken in the golden broth with rice.

breakfast.name: Soft Scrambled Egg Toast
breakfast.instructions: 1. Softly scramble eggs. 2. Serve over toasted milk bread.

lunch.name: Cold Sesame Noodles
lunch.instructions: 1. Cook and cool noodles. 2. Toss with sesame sauce, cucumber, and chicken.

dinner.name: Korean-style Soft Tofu Stew
dinner.instructions: 1. Boil light broth with seafood. 2. Add soft tofu. 3. Season lightly. 4. Serve with rice.

breakfast.name: Savory Rice Crepes
breakfast.instructions: 1. Make thin batter. 2. Steam in sheets. 3. Roll with scallions and serve.

lunch.name: Char Siu Rice Bowl
lunch.instructions: Roast marinated pork butt. Serve sliced over steamed jasmine rice with blanched bok choy.
lunch.notes: Increased pork portion for more meat.

dinner.name: Cantonese Wonton-style Soup
dinner.instructions: Simmer ginger and scallions for broth. Add noodles, cabbage, and sliced pork until heated through.

breakfast.name: Soft Scrambled Egg Congee
breakfast.instructions: Boil rice in excess water to make porridge. Add seasoned minced pork early, then whisked eggs at the end.

lunch.name: Leftover Char Siu Fried Rice
lunch.instructions: Toss rice, diced pork, and carrots in a pan with minimal oil. Finish with sesame oil for aroma.

dinner.name: Steamed Fish with Daikon Soup
dinner.instructions: Steam fish with ginger. Boil daikon in water for soup. Serve together with a side of rice.

breakfast.name: Savory Steamed Egg Custard
breakfast.instructions: Whisk eggs with water. Steam until set. Sauté minced pork and place on top with soy sauce.
breakfast.notes: Added pork topping and extra egg.

lunch.name: Poached Chicken with Ginger-Scallion Oil
lunch.instructions: Poach chicken in simmering water. Serve with a mash of ginger, scallion, and salt. Side of soup.

dinner.name: Beef and Tofu Claypot Style
dinner.instructions: Braise beef, tofu, and mushrooms in oyster sauce. Serve with steamed rice.
dinner.notes: Added beef to the claypot dish.

breakfast.name: Honey-Glazed Char Siu Toast
breakfast.instructions: Warm pork with honey and serve on toasted bread with fruit.
